{{codepointer|Sound}}'''A_PlayerScream''' {{doomwiki|A_PlayerScream}}
(no parameters)
==Usage== Plays the player's death sound. It is important to use this over [[A_Scream]] for players because it has certain properties to it, such as checking the player's skin.
== Examples == An alternative death animation for marine, screams later than usual.
Death.Impale: PLAI A 3 [[A_Pain]] PLAI BCDDD 3 PLAI DEDEDEDE 4 PLAI E 5 '''A_PlayerScream''' PLAI DFG 5 PLAI H -1 stop
